item.title: GERN
item.description: score:207 Chances: Geron Corporation’s pipeline candidate, imetelstat, has received backing from the FDA Committee for the treatment of transfusion-dependent anemia in adult patients with myelodysplastic syndromes. The company’s CEO is scheduled to present at virtual investor conferences, indicating potential positive developments and opportunities for strategic partnerships.
